justification: “An associative memory retrieval test was then administered. Participants were presented with 40 trials where they needed to discriminate between which of either two social elements or two non-social elements were associated with a cued activity element.”

“Participants then performed a drag-and-drop role assignment task, where they needed to decide which role to assign to a person… participants were told… ‘please rank which individual would be the first and second best for each role’.”
“After participants made their recall choice, they are prompted to rate their recall confidence on a continuous scale between 1 and 7.”

measured_by: reaction time recorded during the associative memory test
justification: “Experiment 1.1 participants responded faster in trials they recalled correctly (0.974 s) compared to incorrect trials… We then expected RTs to be quicker in less demanding recall trials.”
